content: the overtime hat is a closet staple with clean lines it s great if you re a beginner knitter or the perfect palette cleanser between big projects it s named for the night i cast on at the start of my son s football game and finished during overtime just in time to celebrate their first win i almost always have one on the needles in my on the go bag and i tuck them into my family s coat pockets as i finish them it s perfect for using up leftover yarn- you can keep it classic or stripe it up with the colors for your favorite team yarn recommended yarn worsted weight 94 112 135 165 194 yds/ 86 102 123 151 177 m yarn used in sample woolfolk far needles us 6 - 16 circular us 6 - 32 circular or needles for preferred small circumference method notions stitch markers tapestry needle blocked gauge 20 sts and 29 row/rounds = 4 / 10 cm in stockinette with main needle sizing to fit head circumference 18 19 5 21 22 5 24 / 46 49 5 53 57 61 cm with height 7 7 5 8 25 9 25 10 / 17 75 19 21 23 5 25 5 cm sample is size large on a 22 head
